product_name: Nite Ize SpotLit LED Carabiner Light
long_description: The bright and versatile Nite Ize SpotLit LED carabiner light will enhance visibility for you or your pet after the sun sets. Strong, stainless-steel spring clip attaches easily to zipper pulls, dog collars and key chains. Squeeze once to engage constant glow, twice for flash mode. Micro-chip-controlled Disc-O LED cycles through the color spectrum. Water-resistant design protects light for use in wet conditions. Nite Ize SpotLit LED carabiner light includes a long-lasting, replaceable battery that lasts up to 20 hrs. in constant glow and 25 hrs. in flash mode. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: The bright and versatile Nite Ize SpotLit LED carabiner light will enhance visibility for you or your pet after the sun sets.
